name: B.A.L.L.S
description:
Balls is an game about shooting balls with your bullets, you must stop the balls from hitting you as this does damage to your character.

After each round you will receive XP and cash these can be spent on skill upgrades, ball upgrades and cosmetics. Upgrading your balls give you higher XP and cash modifiers this makes cash and XP easier to collect, the skills can make the game harder,  more health and quicker firing.

There are global leader boards to compete with others to get to the top of the world!
